subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Formula One driver Kimi Raikkonen drove in his first Nascar race Friday night, and finished 15th in the in the North Carolina Education Lottery 200.
